Smitten Vorbos:
Oh! You have a good heart! You so selflessly help me in matters of the heart... It moved me to tears. (Sob.)
The first key can be found if to destroy the Enslaved spirit.
The orcs had bewitched it with the help of powerful spells, stripped of will and turned into his servant.
The worst thing that Enslaved spirit have to kill. Otherwise the key is not to get it.
It's too cruel... But there is no escape. Otherwise, the Spirits will remain in limbo forever. Destroy the Enslaved spirit and find the First Key from Magic Circuits.
